blocks.name: csimpg
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of simple groups.

blocks.name: df-simpg
blocks.content: Define class of all simple groups. A simple group is a group ( ~ df-grp ) with exactly two normal subgroups. These are always the subgroup of all elements and the subgroup containing only the identity ( ~ simpgnsgbid ). (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: issimpg
blocks.content: The predicate "is a simple group". (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: issimpgd
blocks.content: Deduce a simple group from its properties. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: simpggrp
blocks.content: A simple group is a group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: simpggrpd
blocks.content: A simple group is a group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: simpg2nsg
blocks.content: A simple group has two normal subgroups. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: trivnsimpgd
blocks.content: Trivial groups are not simple. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm trivnsimpgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, csimpg)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
} = {
  nsyl(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
  mtbiri(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o), wbr(csn(c1), cen, c2o))
  snnen2o(c1)
  breq1d(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o, csn(c1), w0)
  trivnsgd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  simpg2nsg(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trivnsimpgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 = { c2 })
} = {
  nsyl(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o)
  mtbiri(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o, { c1 }[≅]2o)
  snnen2o(c1)
  breq1d((NrmSGrp ` c0), cen, c2o, { c1 }, w0)
  trivnsgd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  simpg2nsg(c0)
}

blocks.name: simpgntrivd
blocks.content: Simple groups are nontrivial. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: simpgnideld
blocks.content: A simple group contains a nonidentity element. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm simpgnideld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csimpg))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  mtbid(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c0, csn(c1)))
  simpgntrivd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  ne0d(c0, c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, cmnd))
  simpggrpd(c2, w0)
  grpmnd(c2)
  mndidcl(c2, c1, c0)
  eqsn(s0, c0, c1)
  rexnal(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm simpgnideld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0 = c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(0 ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ SimpGrp)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0 = c1), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1))
  mtbid(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1), c0 = { c1 })
  simpgntrivd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 = { c1 } ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1)), c0 ≠ ∅)
  ne0d(c0, c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ Mnd)
  simpggrpd(c2, w0)
  grpmnd(c2)
  mndidcl(c2, c1, c0)
  eqsn(s0, c0, c1)
  rexnal(s0, c0, s0 = c1)
}

blocks.name: simpgnsgd
blocks.content: The only normal subgroups of a simple group are the group itself and the trivial group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm simpgnsgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
} = {
  rr-php2d(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cnsg, c0), cfn), wcel(c2o, cfn), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2o, cfn), wcel(c2o, com))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c2o, com))
  2onn()
  nnfi(c2o)
  enfii(c2o, cfv(cnsg, c0))
  0idnsgd(c1, c2, c0, w0)
  simpggrpd(c0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, cpr(csn(c1), c2)), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o), wbr(c2o, cen, cpr(csn(c1), c2)))
  syl(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o), wcel(c0, csimpg))
  simpg2nsg(c0)
  ensymd(c2o, cpr(csn(c1), c2), w0)
  enpr2d(csn(c1), c2, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  snex(c1)
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  neqcomd(csn(c1), c2, w0)
  simpgntrivd(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  entr(cfv(cnsg, c0), c2o, cpr(csn(c1), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm simpgnsgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 })
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
} = {
  rr-php2d((NrmSGrp ` c0), { { c1 }, c2 }, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)∈ Fin, 2o ∈ Fin, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o)
  syl(w0, 2o ∈ Fin, 2o ∈ _om)
  a1i(w0, 2o ∈ _om)
  2onn()
  nnfi(c2o)
  enfii(c2o, (NrmSGrp ` c0))
  0idnsgd(c1, c2, c0, w0)
  simpggrpd(c0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]{ { c1 }, c2 }, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o, 2o[≅]{ { c1 }, c2 })
  syl(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o, c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
  simpg2nsg(c0)
  ensymd(c2o, { { c1 }, c2 }, w0)
  enpr2d({ c1 }, c2, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, { c1 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c1)
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, (Base ` c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, c2 =(Base ` c0))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  neqcomd({ c1 }, c2, w0)
  simpgntrivd(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  entr((NrmSGrp ` c0), c2o, { { c1 }, c2 })
}

blocks.name: simpgnsgeqd
blocks.content: A normal subgroup of a simple group is either the whole group or the trivial subgroup. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: 2nsgsimpgd
blocks.content: If any normal subgroup of a nontrivial group is either the trivial subgroup or the whole group, the group is simple. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2nsgsimpgd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wceq(csn(c2), c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  issimpgd(c0, w0)
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o, cpr(csn(c2), c1), w0)
  eqrdv(s0, cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  elprg(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0), csn(c2), c1)
  mpjaodan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0), csn(c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2))))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(csn(c2), cfv(cnsg, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  0nsg(c0, c2)
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), cfv(cnsg, c0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  nsgid(c0, c1)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  elpri(cv(s0), csn(c2), c1)
  enpr2d(csn(c2), c1, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c2), universe))
  snex(c2)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnsg, c0)
  diff.cnsg.s(s0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, csn(c2), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2nsgsimpgd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ { c2 } = c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))→(s0 = { c2 } ∨ s0 = c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  issimpgd(c0, w0)
  eqbrtrd((NrmSGrp ` c0), cen, c2o, { { c2 }, c1 }, w0)
  eqrdv(s0, (NrmSGrp ` c0), { { c2 }, c1 }, w0)
  impbida(w0, s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0), s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 })
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0)), s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 }, (s0 = { c2 } ∨ s0 = c1))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0), (s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 } ↔(s0 = { c2 } ∨ s0 = c1)))
  elprg(s0, (NrmSGrp ` c0), { c2 }, c1)
  mpjaodan((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 }), s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0), s0 = { c2 }, s0 = c1)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 }, s0 = { c2 }, s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))
  eqeltrd(s0, (NrmSGrp ` c0), { c2 }, (w0 ∧ s0 = { c2 }))
  simpr(w0, s0 = { c2 })
  adantr(w0, s0 = { c2 }, { c2 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))
  syl(w0, { c2 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0), c0 ∈ Grp)
  0nsg(c0, c2)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 }, s0 = c1, s0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))
  eqeltrd(s0, (NrmSGrp ` c0), c1, (w0 ∧ s0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, s0 = c1)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c1, c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))
  syl(w0, c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0), c0 ∈ Grp)
  nsgid(c0, c1)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ { { c2 }, c1 }, (s0 = { c2 } ∨ s0 = c1))
  elpri(s0, { c2 }, c1)
  enpr2d({ c2 }, c1, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, { c2 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c2)
  a1i(w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnsg, c0)
  diff.cnsg.s(s0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, { c2 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: simpgnsgbid
blocks.content: A nontrivial group is simple if and only if its normal subgroups are exactly the group itself and the trivial subgroup. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 4-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm simpgnsgbid(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wceq(csn(c1), c2)))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg), wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2)))
  simpgnsgd(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
  2nsgsimpgd(hs0, c0, c2, c1, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2)), wn(wceq(csn(c1), c2)))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cnsg, c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), c2)))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), c2), cfv(cnsg, c0), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cnsg, c0))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  simplr(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cnsg, c0)))
  elpri(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cnsg, c0), cpr(csn(c1), c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm simpgnsgbid(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ SimpGrp ↔(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ { c1 } = c2)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp, (NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 })
  simpgnsgd(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ SimpGrp))
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
  2nsgsimpgd(hs0, c0, c2, c1, (w0 ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }))
  adantr(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }, c0 ∈ Grp)
  adantr(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }, ¬ { c1 } = c2)
  syl(((w0 ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 })∧ hs0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0)), (hs0 = { c1 } ∨ hs0 = c2), hs0 ∈ { { c1 }, c2 })
  eleqtrd(hs0, { { c1 }, c2 }, (NrmSGrp ` c0), ((w0 ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 })∧ hs0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0)))
  simpr((w0 ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }), hs0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))
  simplr(w0, (NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }, hs0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c0))
  elpri(hs0, { c1 }, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)= { { c1 }, c2 }))
}
